category: Herbs that Transform Phlegm and Stop Coughing

action.primary: Clears Heat from the Lungs, transforms Phlegm and disperses Stagnation

indications: Heat Accumulation in the Lungs with viscous, difficult-to-expectorate sputum or hemoptysis
Usually used for long-term disorders, chronic coughing

action.primary: Softens hardness and dissipates Phlegm nodules

indications: Scrofula, goiter and similar disorders caused by Phlegm-Fire

action.primary: Promotes urination and unblocks the upper source for water

indications: Hot, stony painful urinary dysfunction (Stone Lin)

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with cough and rebellious Qi due to Deficient Qi rushing upward.
Contraindicated for those with Phlegm and thin mucus due to Spleen and Stomach Deficiency.
Use caution for those with cough caused by Deficiency and Cold.

notes: Os Costaziae Fu Hai Shi is used interchangeably with Pumex #{FuShi} Fu Shi.
This herb is more effective at dissipating clumps than Fu Shi.
This substance resolves masses and has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
It is commonly used in combination with Concha Meretricis #{GeQiao(HaiGeKe)} Ge Qiao
